data.title: Hailsham Registration District
data.text:
Registration County : Sussex (18371974); East Sussex (197476).

Created : 1.7.1837.

Abolished : 1.4.1976 (added to Eastbourne registration district).

Sub-districts : Bexhill; Hailsham; Hailsham; Hailsham North; Hailsham South; Hellingly; Hurstmonceaux; Rye

GRO volumes : VII (183751); 2b (18521946); 5H (194674); 18 (197476).

District number : 52a (184146); 79 (184769); 70 (187080); 71 (18811908); 72 (190946); 268 (194674); 455 (197476).

Table 1: List of Places in Hailsham Registration District

All the areas in Hailsham registration district became part of the county of East Sussex on 1.4.1889.

Table 2: Boundary Changes affecting Hailsham Registration District
